name: typescript-express-openapi-generator
description: OpenAPI Express REST code generator for TypeScript

scripts.generate: mkdir -p src ; openapi-generator generate -i openapi/main.yml -g typescript-node ; rm -rf api api.ts git_push.sh ; rm -rf src/model ; mv model src
scripts.build: npm run generate ; npm run generateOpenapi ; tsc

author: team@objectified.dev
